sentences.sentence: And he brake down the houses of the sodomites, that were by the house of the LORD, where the women wove hangings for the grove.
sentences.translation: 又拆毁耶和华殿里娈童的屋子，就是妇女为亚舍拉织帐子的屋子。

sentences.sentence: And there were also sodomites in the land: and they did according to all the abominations of the nations which the LORD cast out before the children of Israel.
sentences.translation: 国中也有娈童。犹大人效法耶和华在以色列人面前所赶出的外邦人，行一切可憎恶的事。
